_comment: Real /v0/capabilities response format — chain-keyed by Wormhole chain ID
_WARNING: Schema is live — may change. Validate against LIVE_ENDPOINT_SNAPSHOTS/ before release.

_field_descriptions.requestPrefixes: Relay types supported for this chain as DESTINATION (e.g. ['ERN1'])
_field_descriptions.gasDropOffLimit: Max native token the relayer will drop off (in destination native units)
_field_descriptions.maxGasLimit: Maximum gas limit accepted for the redeem transaction
_field_descriptions.maxMsgValue: Maximum msgValue the relayer will accept

_check_pattern.note: Check dstChainId entry because ERN1 is checked on the DESTINATION side
